data.text: Due wo Ariel,
Nanso, mɛbɔ wo ho nsraban;
Mede dɔm bɛtwa wo ho ahyia;
Wɔsie wo wie a, wobɛkasa afiri asase mu;
Nanso wʼatamfoɔ bebrebe no bɛyɛ sɛ mfuturo muhumuhu,
Asafo Awurade bɛba.
Afei amanaman bebrebe a wɔtu Ariel so sa nyinaa,
Sɛdeɛ obi a ɛkɔm de no so daeɛ sɛ ɔredidi,
Mo ho nnwiri mo na ɛnyɛ mo nwanwa,
Awurade de nnahɔɔ ato mo so:

Mo deɛ saa anisoadehunu yi nyinaa nka hwee mma mo, ɛte sɛ nsɛm a wɔasɔ ano wɔ nwoma mmobɔeɛ mu. Sɛ mode nwoma mmobɔeɛ no ma obi a ɔtumi kenkan, na moka kyerɛ no sɛ, “Mesrɛ wo kenkan yei” a, ɔbɛbua sɛ, “Merentumi, ɛfiri sɛ wɔasɔ ano.”
Sɛ nso, mode nwoma mmobɔeɛ no ma deɛ ɔnnim akenkan, na moka kyerɛ no sɛ, “Mesrɛ wo kenkan yei” a, ɔbɛbua sɛ, “Mennim akenkan.”
Awurade ka sɛ,
Enti mɛma nnipa yi ho adwiri wɔn bio.
Wɔnnue, wɔn a wɔyɛ biribiara sɛ
Mosisi nneɛma tiri ase.
Ɛrenkyɛre koraa, Lebanon bɛdane ayɛ asase bereɛ
Saa ɛda no, ɔsotifoɔ bɛte nsɛm a ɛwɔ nwoma mmobɔeɛ no mu
Ahobrɛasefoɔ bɛdi ahurisie wɔ Awurade mu bio;
Atutupɛfoɔ bɛyera,
Wɔn a wɔka asɛm ma obi di fɔ,
Enti sei na Awurade a ɔgyee Abraham nkwa no
Sɛ wɔhunu wɔn mma wɔ wɔn mu,
Wɔn a wɔfom kwan wɔ honhom mu bɛnya nteaseɛ;
